text: Hello. How are you?
I am good thanks for asking.
Do you donate a lot?
I have not donated in the past but there are organizations I have considered donating to.
I'm a little surprised you've never donated before, can I ask why not?
Something always seems to come up and I need to pay for something. Usually something involving the house.
Gotcha, I understand those neccessary purchases too well.
Yes, if I had more expendable income I would absolutely donate.
Understandable, of course, although we do get good pay out of this task that we can donate.
That is true. That makes it easier.
Have you heard of Save the Children?
I have heard the name.
It's a great charity I've considered donating some of my payment too, if you want to do the same.
How do they help?
What do you mean, like how does the charity help children?
Yes, how do they help with children? What does the organization do?
They provide relief for kids and they help underprivileged kids with things they need, such as water, first aid, etc.
Is this all over the country?
I believe so, it extends to other countries as well.
It sounds like a good charity.
